properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME_KO , PRODUCT_NAME_ENG , PRODUCT_IMG_M , BRAND_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_CODE) WHERE BLIND_CHECK ='N'

SELECT PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME_KO , PRODUCT_NAME_ENG , MODEL_CODE , PRODUCT_IMG_M , PRODUCT_SIZE , BRAND_NAME , COLOR , RELEASE_DATE , TO_CHAR(RELEASE_PRICE, 'fmL999,999,999') "RELEASE_PRICE" FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_BRAND USING (BRAND_CODE) WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = ?
